verses.text: The LORD spoke to Moses and to Aaron, saying:
verses.comment: This closely matches the Hebrew; 'The LORD' renders the Tetragrammaton (YHWH) as per standard practice.

verses.text: The people of Israel shall camp, each by his own standard, with the banners of their fathers’ houses. They shall camp facing the tent of meeting on every side.
verses.comment: Rendered 'standard' and 'banners' as literal to reflect the tribal ensigns.

verses.text: Those who camp on the east side, toward the sunrise, shall be of the standard of the camp of Judah by their divisions. The leader of the sons of Judah shall be Nahshon the son of Amminadab,
verses.comment: ‘Toward the sunrise’ explicitly translates the direction (literally, ‘east’ in Hebrew).

verses.text: and his company, as listed by their names, were seventy-four thousand six hundred.
verses.comment: ‘Company’ translates the Hebrew ‘tz’va’am’, often 'hosts' or 'divisions'.

verses.text: And those camping next to him shall be the tribe of Issachar. The leader of the sons of Issachar shall be Nethanel the son of Zuar,
verses.comment: The original has 'next to him' - rendered closely.

verses.text: and his company, as listed, were fifty-four thousand four hundred.
verses.comment: Text follows the enumeration in the census.

verses.text: Then the tribe of Zebulun. The leader of the sons of Zebulun shall be Eliab the son of Helon,
verses.comment: Literal rendering of tribal order.

verses.text: and his company, as listed, were fifty-seven thousand four hundred.
verses.comment: Follows the numbering as in the census.

verses.text: All those listed of the camp of Judah, by their divisions, were one hundred eighty-six thousand four hundred. They shall set out first on the march.
verses.comment: ‘Set out first’—lit. go out in the lead; stays very close to Hebrew.

verses.text: On the south side shall be the standard of the camp of Reuben by their divisions. The leader of the sons of Reuben shall be Elizur the son of Shedeur,
verses.comment: ‘South side’ renders the Hebrew 'teman'.

verses.text: and his company, as listed, were forty-six thousand five hundred.
verses.comment: Census number for Reuben.

verses.text: And those who camp next to him shall be the tribe of Simeon. The leader of the sons of Simeon shall be Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai,
verses.comment: Follows order of tribes as listed in the Hebrew.

verses.text: and his company, as listed, were fifty-nine thousand three hundred.
verses.comment: Literal enumeration.

verses.text: Then the tribe of Gad. The leader of the sons of Gad shall be Eliasaph the son of Deuel,
verses.comment: Preserves order and names.

verses.text: and his company, as listed, were forty-five thousand six hundred fifty.
verses.comment: Literal census figure.

verses.text: All those listed of the camp of Reuben, by their divisions, were one hundred fifty-one thousand four hundred fifty. They shall set out second.
verses.comment: 'Set out second' as in the Hebrew (lit. 'they shall move forward second').

verses.text: Then the tent of meeting shall set out with the camp of the Levites in the midst of the camps. As they camp, so they shall set out, each in order, standard by standard.
verses.comment: ‘Standard by standard’ means banner by banner; kept literal.

verses.text: On the west side shall be the standard of the camp of Ephraim by their divisions. The leader of the sons of Ephraim shall be Elishama the son of Ammihud,
verses.comment: ‘West side’ renders Hebrew ‘yama’.

verses.text: and his company, as listed, were forty thousand five hundred.
verses.comment: Literal census statistic.

verses.text: And next to him shall be the tribe of Manasseh. The leader of the sons of Manasseh shall be Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur,
verses.comment: ‘Next to him’ follows Hebrew word order.

verses.text: and his company, as listed, were thirty-two thousand two hundred.
verses.comment: Enumeration matches the census.

verses.text: Then the tribe of Benjamin. The leader of the sons of Benjamin shall be Abidan the son of Gideoni,
verses.comment: Follows the original list.

verses.text: and his company, as listed, were thirty-five thousand four hundred.
verses.comment: Literal rendering.

verses.text: All those listed of the camp of Ephraim, by their divisions, were one hundred eight thousand one hundred. They shall set out third.
verses.comment: ‘Set out third’ matches Hebrew syntax.

verses.text: On the north side shall be the standard of the camp of Dan by their divisions. The leader of the sons of Dan shall be Ahiezer the son of Ammishaddai,
verses.comment: ‘North side’ is literal.

verses.text: and his company, as listed, were sixty-two thousand seven hundred.
And those who camp next to him shall be the tribe of Asher. The leader of the sons of Asher shall be Pagiel the son of Ochran,
and his company, as listed, were forty-one thousand five hundred.
Then the tribe of Naphtali. The leader of the sons of Naphtali shall be Ahira the son of Enan,
and his company, as listed, were fifty-three thousand four hundred.
All those listed of the camp of Dan, by their divisions, were one hundred fifty-seven thousand six hundred. They shall set out last, standard by standard.
verses.comment: 'Set out last' and 'standard by standard' kept literal to match the Hebrew.

verses.text: These are those of the people of Israel, as listed by their fathers’ houses. All those listed in the camps, by their divisions, were six hundred three thousand five hundred fifty.
verses.comment: Reflects final census total of all tribes except Levites.

verses.text: But the Levites were not listed among the people of Israel, as the LORD commanded Moses.
verses.comment: Explicit note that Levites were excluded, as in the Hebrew.

verses.text: Thus the people of Israel did. According to all that the LORD commanded Moses, so they camped by their standards, and so they set out, each one by his clan, according to his fathers’ house.
verses.comment: Preserves word order; ‘standards’ is literal for banners or ensigns.
